Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_00>Hyah...<sp:5:1:0> *pant*...<sp:5:1:0> *pant*...<sp:5:1:0> Prepare mind
and body...<sp:5:1:0> Explore in underpants...
Talk_22:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I get that we have to train, but...<sp:5:0:0>why do they insist
that we do so in our underwear?

And we're supposed to investigate caves that might
be monster strongholds? Dressed like this?

<snd:Think>I'm no expert, but I'm pretty sure we'd suffer fewer
injuries if we put on some clothes. Or at least took
some weapons and shields with us.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_23: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* I hope I can get this over with by noon...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_24: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* I hope I'm done with this before it gets dark...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_25:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Ahh, what a beautiful sunset... No, this is no time to
take in the sights. I've a training regimen to finish.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:0:2:2:5000>*sigh* I hope I'll be done before it gets dark...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_26:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Brr... I'm soaked.<sp:5:1:0> No way I'm getting through this
without catching a cold...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_27:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Urgh... I really don't get it. How does doing this in
my underpants help matters?

I joined the research division because I liked the
uniform. Will I ever actually get to wear it?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_28: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* I hope I'm done with this by sunrise...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_29:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh... I'm starting to think I'll never wear
that uniform.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
